who.label: Who am I?
description: I'm a $t(profile.role), more on the $t(tech.react) side. I'm a big fan of $t(tech.remix) and love to use $t(tech.ts). I'm a $t(tech.tailwind) fan, and use it with $t(tech.shad).
I like to build efficient web application, love to teach and share knowledge. You can see me on discord and ask me for help!

My objective is to be a part of a team where we collaborate and share a large amount of knowledge with each other to grow together and make high-quality products that push the company to new heights. I also aim to utilize my ability to find innovative solutions in the face of unexpected challenges, contributing to the company's overall success.

openness.label: Openness
description: I am open to new experiences and new ideas. I am curious and enjoy learning new things.
Sharing knowledge is one of my core idea. I take the time to teach other as much as I can.

quality.label: Quality
description: I strive to do my best in everything I do. I am proud of my work and committed to delivering quality products. I am always looking for new ways to improve my skills and knowledge, whether it be in tools or languages.

creativity.label: Creativity
description: I am creative and enjoy finding innovative solutions to problems. I am always looking for new ideas and ways of doing things. I enjoy creating things and am proud of my imagination. I appreciate seeing my ideas come to life and watching my creations come to life.

honesty.label: Honesty
description: I am honest and committed to being transparent and keeping my promises. I am trustworthy and proud of my integrity. I appreciate both telling the truth and hearing it, whether it is positive or negative.

causes.label: Which causes are importants to me?

spa.label: The S.P.A.
description: The spa had an important impact on my life. I grew up with animals (dogs and cats), knowing how they share their love unconditionally.
My best friend, Posix, is a cat who was abandoned on the side of the road, tail broken and his heart broken. Now he has a family, he has healed from depression, and is happy to share cuddles.
Too many fur friends are abandoned as if they are toys. They have feelings and love their family.

restos.label: Les Restos du Cœur
description: "$t(profile.causes.restos.label)" provide valuable assistance to those in need by providing hot and nutritious meals for free. They are a source of support for people who are struggling to make ends meet and who would not be able to afford food otherwise.
They are important to me, as when I was younger, they helped my family to live during a hard financial moment.

description.react: From class to Function Components, soon Server Components?
description.node: NodeJS is one of my favorite tools. I'm still open to test things like Bun or Deno, but currently I feel they are not enough mature in comparison of nodejs
description.remix: Remix totally changed the way I build application. Efficient, I can build a large amount of stuff in a minimal of time. And still have a app able to render fast and with no js if needed.
description.ts: I like types in my apps.
description.postgres: Postgres is a great database. Not that much to say.
description.docker: It work on my computer (and others)
